flags.title: Validator Centralization Risk
flags.retail: Solana's validator set is still relatively centralized.
flags.analyst: ~30â€“40% of voting power is controlled by fewer than 10 validators, raising concerns during network events.

flags.title: Frequent Network Outages
flags.retail: Solana has suffered multiple network halts in the past.
flags.analyst: Solana experienced full mainnet outages in Jan 2022, Sept 2022, and Feb 2023 due to block congestion and forking.

flags.title: Token Unlocks & VC Influence
flags.retail: Some say VCs got early access to a big share of SOL tokens.
flags.analyst: ~48% of SOL supply was allocated to insiders (VCs, team, foundation), causing concern for long-term distribution fairness.

flags.title: GitHub Activity
flags.analyst: Solana Foundation and Labs maintain multiple active GitHub repos with frequent commits.
